title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a label in library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the label item in library outline view.

Expected Behavior(EB): The label item should be selected and the focus should remain on it.

Observed Behavior(OB): When attempting to select the label item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
SR:
Add a label in library file.
Open the library outline view.
Select the label item in library outline view.
